name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing robust backend systems, with a strong emphasis on using **C#**, **.NET**, **.NET Core**, and **ASP.NET** to deliver high-quality applications. Proficient in implementing **REST**ful services and utilizing **MS SQL Server**, **Redis**, and **ElasticSearch** for data management and retrieval. Experienced in using **RabbitMQ** for message queuing and integrating frontend frameworks like **Vue.js** and **jQuery** to enhance user experience. Demonstrated ability to apply design patterns and algorithms to solve complex problems efficiently. Fluent in English and committed to maintaining high standards in project delivery, evidenced by a successful track record at organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska. Adept at collaborating within agile teams using tools like **GitLab** and **Atlassian** for project management and code versioning.
